generalDescription: A complete starter template with the next modules preinstalled.
tailwindDescription: A utility-first CSS framework packed with classes like flex, pt-4, text-center and rotate-90 that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.
headlessDescription: Completely unstyled, fully accessible UI components, designed to integrate beautifully with Tailwind CSS.
NuxtAuthDescription: nuxt-auth is an open source Nuxt module that provides authentication for Nuxt 3 applications.
PiniaDescription: The intuitive store for Vue.js. Type Safe, Extensible, and Modular by design. Forget you are even using a store.
NuxtIconDescription: Add 100,000+ ready to use icons to your Nuxt application, based on Iconify.
I18nDescription: i18next is an internationalization-framework written in and for JavaScript. But it's much more than that!
NuxtImageDescription: Plug-and-play image optimization for Nuxt apps. Resize and transform your images using built-in optimizer or your favorite images CDN.
NuxtContentDescription: Nuxt Content reads the content/ directory in your project, parses .md, .yml, .csv and .json files to create a powerful data layer for your application. Use Vue components in Markdown with the MDC syntax.
